quotes.message: Some of us think holding on makes us strong; but sometimes it is letting go.
quotes.name: Hermann Hesse

quotes.message: We gain strength, and courage, and confidence by each experience in which we really stop to look fear in the face... we must do that which we think we cannot.
quotes.name: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.message: Strength does not come from physical capacity. It comes from an indomitable will.
quotes.name: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.message: You have power over your mind - not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength.
quotes.name: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.message: We may get knocked down on the outside, but the key to living in victory is to learn how to get up on the inside.
quotes.name: Joel Osteen

quotes.message: Sometimes you don't realize your own strength until you come face to face with your greatest weakness.
quotes.name: Susan Gale

quotes.message: You gotta stop wearing your wishbone where your backbone ought to be.
quotes.name: Elizabeth Gilbert

quotes.message: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: Few men during their lifetime come anywhere near exhausting the resources dwelling within them. There are deep wells of strength that are never used.
quotes.name: Richard E. Byrd

quotes.message: A chain is no stronger than its weakest link.
quotes.name: Sir Leslie Stephen

quotes.message: A firm tree does not fear the storm.
quotes.name: Dayak

quotes.message: Control your emotions or they will control you.
quotes.name: Chinese Proverb

quotes.message: He that cannot endure the bad will not live to see the good.
quotes.name: Jewish Proverb

quotes.message: Little strokes fell great oaks.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: Our handicaps exist only in our minds.
quotes.name: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.message: No one saves us but ourselves. No one can and no one may. We ourselves must walk the path.
quotes.name: Buddha

quotes.message: That which does not kill us makes us stronger.
quotes.name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.message: We are only as strong as we are united, as weak as we are divided.
quotes.name: J.K. Rowling

quotes.message: In the depth of winter, I finally learned that within me there lay an invincible summer.
quotes.name: Albert Camus

quotes.message: Better to be strong than pretty and useless.
quotes.name: Lilith Saintcrow

quotes.message: Anyone can give up, it's the easiest thing in the world to do. But to hold it together when everyone else would understand if you fell apart, that's true strength.
quotes.name: Unknown Author

quotes.message: Fall down seven times, get up eight.
quotes.name: Japanese Proverb

quotes.message: The most beautiful people I've known are those who have known trials, have known struggles, have known loss, and have found their way out of the depths.
quotes.name: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross

quotes.message: Strong people don't put people down.
quotes.name: Unknown Author

quotes.message: When you come to the end of your rope, tie a knot and hang on.
quotes.name: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.message: Never bend your head. Always hold it high. Look the world right in the eye.
quotes.name: Helen Keller

quotes.message: He who believes is strong; he who doubts is weak. Strong convictions precede great actions.
quotes.name: J.F. Clarke

quotes.message: You were given this life, because you are strong enough to live it.
quotes.name: Robin Sharma

quotes.message: Life will break you. Nobody can protect you from that, and living alone won't either, for solitude will also break you with its yearning. You have to love. You have to feel. It is the reason you are here on earth. You are here to risk your heart. You are here to be swallowed up. And when it happens that you are broken, or betrayed, or left, or hurt, or death brushes near, let yourself sit by an apple tree and listen to the apples falling all around you in heaps, wasting their sweetness. Tell yourself you tasted as many as you could.
quotes.name: Louise Erdrich

quotes.message: Where there is no struggle, there is no strength
quotes.name: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.message: Only those who will risk going too far can possibly find out how far one can go.
quotes.name: T.S. Elliot

quotes.message: Eagles don't catch flies.
quotes.name: Desiderius Erasmus

quotes.message: Persuasion is better than force.
quotes.name: Aesop

quotes.message: The best way out is always through.
quotes.name: Robert Frost

quotes.message: The weak can never forgive. Forgiveness is the attribute of the strong.
quotes.name: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.message: We acquire the strength we have overcome.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: Strength is a matter of a made up mind.
quotes.name: John Beecher

quotes.message: Never say never, because limits, like fears, are often just an illusion.
quotes.name: Michael Jordan

quotes.message: If you always put limit on everything you do, physical or anything else. It will spread into your work and into your life. There are no limits. There are only plateaus, and you must not stay there, you must go beyond them.
quotes.name: Bruce Lee

quotes.message: An attitude of positive expectation is the mark of the superior personality.
quotes.name: Brian Tracy

quotes.message: The only place where your dream becomes impossible is in your own thinking.
quotes.name: Robert H. Schuller

quotes.message: No matter what the situation, remind yourself 'I have a choice.
quotes.name: Deepak Chopra

quotes.message: Look at a day when you are supremely satisfied at the end.
quotes.name: Margaret Thatcher

quotes.message: Focus on your strengths, not your weaknesses. Focus on your character, not your reputation. Focus on your blessings, not your misfortunes.
quotes.name: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.message: A strong woman who recklessly throws away her strength, she is worse than a weak woman who has never had any strength to throw away.
quotes.name: Thomas Hardy

quotes.message: A man is worshipped only to the extent that he is followed not in his weaknesses, but in his strength.
quotes.name: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.message: No training in arms is required for realization of your strength.
quotes.name: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.message: God, grant me strength to accept those things I cannot change.
quotes.name: Dan Brown

quotes.message: I hope you have the strength to start all over again.
quotes.name: Eric Roth

quotes.message: Meet today's problems with today's strength. Don't start tackling tomorrow's problems until tomorrow. You do not have tomorrow's strength yet. You simply have enough for today.
quotes.name: Max Lucado

quotes.message: We see no mask of strength. But we do hear a request for strength.
quotes.name: Max Lucado

quotes.message: To get someone else to take care of you, to feel sorry for you--that takes a lot of strength, smarts, manipulation.
quotes.name: Deb Caletti

quotes.message: Focus only on the moments when you achieved what you desired, and that strength will help you to get what you want.
quotes.name: Paulo Coelho

quotes.message: It takes a hell of a lot of strength to not complain and lash out.
quotes.name: Richelle Mead

quotes.message: Mastering others is strength.
quotes.name: Lao Tzu

quotes.message: The strength of a man isn't seen in the power of his arms. It's seen in the love with which he embraces you.
quotes.name: Steve Maraboli

quotes.message: Your strength, when your very existence Is proof of your greatness. You were born a winner, a warrior, one who defied the odds by surviving the most gruesome battle of them all.
quotes.name: Suzy Kassem

quotes.message: The strength I'm looking for isn't the type where you win or lose. I'm not after a wall that'll repel power coming from outside. What I want is the kind of strength to be able to absorb that kind of power, to stand up to it.
quotes.name: Haruki Murakami

quotes.message: Moderate strength is shown in violence, supreme strength is shown in levity.
quotes.name: G. K. Chesterton

quotes.message: At your weakest, you end up showing more strength; at your lowest, you are suddenly lifted higher than you’ve ever been.
quotes.name: Cecelia Ahern

quotes.message: I found an inner strength to fight for myself. It was clear that nobody else would.
quotes.name: Tehmina Durrani

quotes.message: Strength of character means the ability to overcome resentment against others, to hide hurt feelings, and to forgive quickly.
quotes.name: Lawrence G. Lovasik

quotes.message: You must draw from that strength. You must increase it. And you must hold on to it because sometimes that small glimmer of inner strength is all that we have to help us press forward through the darkness.
quotes.name: Morgan Rhodes

quotes.message: The crisis throws you back, and when you are required to exhibit strength, it comes.
quotes.name: Joseph Campbell

quotes.message: You can measure the true strength of a man by how well he controls others, but you measure his true power by how well he controls himself.
quotes.name: Amari Soul

quotes.message: There was a saying that the strength of a man’s steel was only known under the hammer of circumstance.
quotes.name: Alison Goodman

quotes.message: From my weakness, I drew strength that never left me.
quotes.name: Jorge Luis Borges

quotes.message: His wound is his strength.
quotes.name: Lev Grossman

quotes.message: We know you're strong, but accepting help is its own kind of strength.
quotes.name: Kiera Cass

quotes.message: Finding the center of strength within ourselves is in the long run the best contribution we can make to our fellow men.
quotes.name: Rollo May

quotes.message: One person with indigenous inner strength exercises a great calming effect on panic among people around him.
quotes.name: Rollo May

quotes.message: A lot of what we experience as strength comes from knowing what to do with weakness.
quotes.name: Barbara Ehrenreich

quotes.message: The first gift is Strength. May you remember to call upon it whenever you need it.
quotes.name: Charlene Costanzo

quotes.message: It takes incredible strength not to open a can of 'whoop-ass', justifiably, when ones button is pushed.
quotes.name: T. F. Hodge

quotes.message: We had something few experience. We were joined in our strengths rather than in our weaknesses.
quotes.name: Frank Herbert

quotes.message: We all get scared and want to turn away, but it isn’t always strength that makes you stay. Strength is also making the decision to change your destiny.
quotes.name: Zoraida Córdova

quotes.message: How fast you have forgotten your strength when your very existence is proof of your greatness.
quotes.name: Suzy Kassem

quotes.message: There are two kinds of strength. Power and the ability to wield it is obvious, but resilience, the ability to resist power, is the other.
quotes.name: Raymond E. Feist

quotes.message: It takes strength, the strength of a man, to make the magic his own, to make it serve him, and not the other way around.
quotes.name: Daniel Wallace

quotes.message: You can't retire to weakness -- you've got to learn to control strength.
quotes.name: Wallace Stegner

quotes.message: Only when we cease to rely on our own strength can we discover that God's strength is always there for us.
quotes.name: Scott Hahn

quotes.message: Strength and success - they are above morality, above criticism.
quotes.name: John Steinbeck

quotes.message: My dear, it is a great strength to have faced the worst and to have *felt* it a feature of beauty. Nothing ever after can shake one.
quotes.name: Olaf Stapledon

quotes.message: The strength of every individual is the grace for great work.
quotes.name: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.message: May you find the strength of will and the grace of endurance to overcome every challenge.
quotes.name: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.message: Rather than the strength it takes to not lose, it's the strength to stand back up after a loss that is sometimes more valuable.
quotes.name: Kyo Shirodaira

quotes.message: The strongest people are not those who show strength in front of the world but those who fight and win battles that others do not know anything about.
quotes.name: Jonathan Harnisch
